mapper.sql: t.id, t.create_by AS "createBy.id", t.create_date, t.update_by AS "updateBy.id", t.update_date, t.del_flag, t.remarks, t.pay_date, t.pay_type, t.plateform, t.price, t.team_name, t.contacts, t.linked_phone, t.deadline, t.days
mapper.select:
SELECT po.id as id, po.date_created as pay_date, pp.description as pay_type, po.platform as plateform, po.total_fee as price, t.`name` as team_name, td.contacts as contacts, td.phone_number as linked_phone, po.days as days, po.body as description, t.id as teamId FROM pay_order po, pay_product pp, team t, team_data td WHERE po.pay_product_id = pp.id AND po.team_id = t.id AND td.team_id = t.id AND po.status = TRUE
AND t.name like CONCAT(#{teamName},'%')
AND td.contacts like CONCAT(#{contacts},'%')
AND po.date_created >= #{payBeginDate}
AND #{payEndDate} >= po.date_created
ORDER BY po.date_created DESC
